about_the_game:
Black Market. It’s a pumpkin.

Appearing out of nowhere one Winter-cycle, this headgear is the choice of many thugs looking to trick unlucky habbers into giving them treats.

Many argue over the Jack-o’-lantern being a fruit or vegetable, when it is in fact a piece of highly flame retardant headgear with interior lit lighting. Ideal for those cool dark nights when you are tempted to get a little too close to the heat of a Magmamaker.

The Halloween pack also includes:

  • The Skeleton shirt

  • A Skull Face Tattoo

This content requires the base game The Ascent on Steam in order to play.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features violence, gore and bad language.

detailed_description:
Black Market. It’s a pumpkin.

Appearing out of nowhere one Winter-cycle, this headgear is the choice of many thugs looking to trick unlucky habbers into giving them treats.

Many argue over the Jack-o’-lantern being a fruit or vegetable, when it is in fact a piece of highly flame retardant headgear with interior lit lighting. Ideal for those cool dark nights when you are tempted to get a little too close to the heat of a Magmamaker.

The Halloween pack also includes:

  • The Skeleton shirt

  • A Skull Face Tattoo

This content requires the base game The Ascent on Steam in order to play.

name: The Ascent - Halloween Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 ( 2048 MB) / Radeon R9 390X (8192 MB)
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Specification listed above allows gameplay experience close to 30 FPS on average while using 1080p resolution and lowest settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K (4 * 4000) or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (6 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 (8192 MB) / Radeon RX 5700 (8192 MB)
  • Additional Notes: The Recommended Specification listed below allows gameplay experience close to 60 FPS on average while using 1080p resolution and overall “High” settings:
